actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to guarantee cost-of-living increases in benefits under the old-age, survivors, and disability insurance program.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to eliminate the requirements that inflation must rise above the three percent level before there will be a cost-of-living increase in OASDI benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to guarantee cost-of-living increases in benefits under the old-age, survivors, and disability insurance program.
